overview:
Rik Haandrikman is Director of Business Development at GamePoint, a realtime multiplayer social gaming company.

Prior to his work at GamePoint, Rik was active in the entertainment industry, advising different (independent) record labels on marketing, PR and brand identity issues. He has also been involved in a series of high-profile Dutch and European dance events.

By running the GamePoint marketing and sales departments Rik acquired extensive knowledge of digital marketing, the international media business and has built an impressive network of relations with key decision makers in a range of well-known companies.

In addition to his work at GamePoint, Rik regularly shares his knowledge of the industry on Quora and advises several small to medium-sized companies on their marketing and social media strategies.
